original_text: Aaron must go into the Tent of Meeting. He must take off his special linen clothes. The holy clothes must stay in the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 아론은 회막에 들어가서 지성소에 들어갈 때에 입었던 세마포 옷을 벗어 거기 두고

sentences.original_text: Aaron must go into the Tent of Meeting
He must take off his special linen clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 특별한 linen 옷을 벗어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The holy clothes must stay in the Tent of Meeting
